answers.answer: Sorry sweetheart hope it goes better tomorrow just think of it this way if it didnt happen today maybe there is a reson you dont know about, some divine intervention.

Had to go through a week worth of calling the hospital every morning at 7a to see if I could come in to be induced, they were full all week and baby was not under any stress so I wasn't priority. Good luck tomorrow, hopefully you have friends or family who can help with the other 5.......Good luck!
Im sorry to hear that ! I wouldnt be to upset at the staff because sometimes  urgent cases come up and they have to put them first. But that is BS they said to come back... Sorry to hear that.

O-My Isangillo, that's awful!  I live in an itty bitty town so two girls is all they could handle.  I'm not Im not upset with the staff though,  I understand things happen.  My dr. was off last weekend,  so couldn't do it than, and today was as soon as they could get me in. I figured it is what it is and will happen in God's perfect timing and not my own. But I've had set back after set back with family that were supposed to be here and things came up, this was just kinda the straw that broke the camels back. Been in labor for weeks and only to 3cm, supposed to have the baby a week early because of my gestational diabetes, and having big baby's. But tomorrow is my official due date, and hoping he hasn't grown to big.
Hope everything works out for you tomorrow.

question: So I was scheduled for my induction today. Called 30 minutes before my appointment,  told it's cancelled.  Called to come back and they can induce, been there all day and just sent home saying they can't again.  But if I happen to go into labor on my own and they'll have to make room for me and they'll make it work.  Other wise,  come back tomorrow and they promise to induce.  Did I mention I live 40 minutes away with 5 kids who won't have child care tomorrow,  because we're supposed to be having our baby today? What a day! Not looking forward to tomorrow or having to go through this ordeal again exhausted already, irritated,  and happiness has been zilched out today.
title: Utterly frustrated!
